about_the_game:
Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court. She has the task of travelling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase has to confront a nest of monsters in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. She receives help to increase her fighting strength from a nearby sorceress in exchange for a price. By following Ayase, helping her win the battle, see how far you can go and you will receive exciting rewards.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
- Game features -

Ayase hot scenes
Fight alongside Ayase, earn gold rewards, and buy puzzle pieces from the secret shop during or after the game.

Experience diverse emotions
You may feel yourself in thrilling and intense situations, relieved when completing levels, feeling like a powerful deity, or captivated by Ayase's allure.

Trading cards and achievements
Trading cards and achievements will be available soon.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content in gallery.
-Not suitable for watching gallery at work.
-Not suitable for all ages.
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
💟NEW RELEASE!!💟


About the Game

Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court. She has the task of travelling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase has to confront a nest of monsters in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. She receives help to increase her fighting strength from a nearby sorceress in exchange for a price. By following Ayase, helping her win the battle, see how far you can go and you will receive exciting rewards.
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
- Game features -

Ayase hot scenes
Fight alongside Ayase, earn gold rewards, and buy puzzle pieces from the secret shop during or after the game.

Experience diverse emotions
You may feel yourself in thrilling and intense situations, relieved when completing levels, feeling like a powerful deity, or captivated by Ayase's allure.

Trading cards and achievements
Trading cards and achievements will be available soon.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Ayase, the Sexy Archer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Ayase is an archer and hunter of the king's court with the task of traveling far and wide to eliminate the monsters that have ravaged her homeland. This time, Ayase confronts a nest of monster in an abandoned village near the old palace of the king. Follow Ayase and see how far you can go.
